logo.description: AURA AERO company logo, the main brand identifier
logo.usage: Used in the header and throughout the site as primary branding element

backgroundDefault.description: Default background image used across the site
backgroundDefault.usage: Applied as background texture or pattern on various pages

appleTouchIcon.description: Apple touch icon for iOS devices
appleTouchIcon.usage: Displayed when users add the site to their iOS home screen

favicon16.description: Small favicon for browser tabs and bookmarks
favicon16.usage: Displayed in browser tabs and bookmark lists

favicon32.usage: Displayed in browser tabs and bookmark lists on high-DPI screens

safariPinnedTab.usage: Displayed when users pin the tab in Safari browser

webManifest.description: Web app manifest file defining PWA properties
webManifest.usage: Used by browsers to understand how to display the site as a web app
